verses.t: That which{G3739} was{G2258} from{G575}the beginning{G746}, which{G3739} we have heard{G191}, which{G3739} we have seen with{G3708} our{G2257} eyes{G3588}, which{G3739} we have looked upon{G2300}, and{G2532} our{G2257} hands{G3588} have handled{G5584}, of{G4012} the Word{G3588} of life{G3588};not positive which tag to place "with" with (…we have seen with our…)

(For{G2532} the life{G3588} was manifested{G5319}, and{G2532} we have seen{G3708} it, and{G2532} bear witness{G3140}, and{G2532} shew{G518} unto you{G5213} that{G3588} eternal{G166} life{G2222}, which{G3748} was{G2258} with{G4314} the Father{G3588}, and{G2532} was manifested{G5319} unto us{G2254};)

That which{G3739} we have seen{G3708} and{G2532} heard{G191} declare we{G518} unto you{G5213}, that{G2443} ye{G5210} also{G2532} may have{G2192} fellowship{G2842} with{G3326} us{G2257}: and{G2532} truly{G1161} our{G2251} fellowship{G3588} is with{G3326} the Father{G3588}, and{G2532} with{G3326} his{G846} Son{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}.
And{G2532} these things{G5023} write we{G1125} unto you{G5213}, that{G2443} your{G5216} joy{G3588} may be{G5600} full{G4137}.

This{G3778} then{G2532} is{G2076} the message{G3588} which{G3739} we have heard{G191} of{G575} him{G846}, and{G2532} declare{G312} unto you{G5213}, that{G3754} God{G3588} is{G2076} light{G5457}, and{G2532} in{G1722} him{G846} is{G2076} no{G3756} darkness{G4653} at all{G3762}.

If{G1437} we say{G2036} that{G3754} we have{G2192} fellowship{G2842} with{G3326} him{G846}, and{G2532} walk{G4043} in{G1722} darkness{G3588}, we lie{G5574}, and{G2532} do{G4160} not{G3756} the truth{G3588}:

But{G1161} if{G1437} we walk{G4043} in{G1722} the light{G3588}, as{G5613} he{G846} is{G2076} in{G1722} the light{G3588}, we have{G2192} fellowship{G2842} one{G240} with{G3326} another{G240}, and{G2532} the blood{G3588} of Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} his{G846} Son{G3588} cleanseth{G2511} us{G2248} from{G575} all{G3956} sin{G266}.
If{G1437} we say{G2036} that{G3754} we have{G2192} no{G3756} sin{G266}, we deceive{G4105} ourselves{G1438}, and{G2532} the truth{G3588} is{G2076} not{G3756} in{G1722} us{G2254}.

If{G1437} we confess{G3670} our{G2257} sins{G3588}, he is{G2076} faithful{G4103} and{G2532} just{G1342} to{G2443} forgive{G863} us{G2254} our sins{G3588}, and{G2532} to cleanse{G2511} us{G2248} from{G575} all{G3956} unrighteousness{G93}.
If{G1437} we say{G2036} that{G3754} we have{G264} not{G3756} sinned{G264}, we make{G4160} him{G846} a liar{G5583}, and{G2532} his{G846} word{G3588} is{G2076} not{G3756} in{G1722} us{G2254}.
